sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Běibù dìqū dōngtiān hěn lěng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La région du nord est très froide en hiver.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The northern region is very cold in winter.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个传统至今仍在延续。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège chuántǒng zhìjīn réng zài yánxù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette tradition se poursuit encore aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This tradition continues to this day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèlǐ de fēngjǐng zhēn měi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le paysage ici est vraiment beau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The scenery here is really beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 会议定在明天上午九点。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huìyì dìng zài míngtiān shàngwǔ jiǔ diǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La réunion est prévue demain matin à neuf heures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The meeting is scheduled for nine o'clock tomorrow morning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā fùzé guǎnlǐ zhěnggè tuánduì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est responsable de la gestion de toute l'équipe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is responsible for managing the entire team.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 除了汉语，他还会说英语。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Chúle Hànyǔ, tā hái huì shuō Yīngyǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En plus du chinois, il parle aussi anglais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Besides Chinese, he can also speak English.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì yī gè zhòngdà de juédìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une décision importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is a major decision.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng tiánxiě zhè zhāng biǎogé.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez remplir ce formulaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please fill in this form.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bǎ yīfu guà zài yījià shàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Accroche les vêtements sur le cintre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Hang the clothes on the hanger.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个城市的文化生活很丰富。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège chéngshì de wénhuà shēnghuó hěn fēngfù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La vie culturelle de cette ville est très riche.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The cultural life of this city is very rich.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这家工厂主要加工食品。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiā gōngchǎng zhǔyào jiāgōng shípǐn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette usine traite principalement des produits alimentaires.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This factory mainly processes food.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tàiyáng cóng xībian luòxia.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le soleil se couche à l'ouest.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sun sets in the west.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī fābiǎo le yī fèn shēngmíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a publié une déclaration.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company issued a statement.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 男女学生的比例是一比一。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nánnǚ xuésheng de bǐlì shì yī bǐ yī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le ratio étudiants/étudiantes est de un pour un.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The ratio of male to female students is one to one.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gǎndào fēicháng bù'ān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle se sent très inquiète.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She feels very uneasy.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他有本事解决这个问题。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǒu běnshi jiějué zhège wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a les compétences pour résoudre ce problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has the ability to solve this problem.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shuǐ de biǎomiàn hěn píngjìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La surface de l'eau est très calme.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The surface of the water is very calm.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiān shàng yǒu hěn duō báiyún.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de nuages blancs dans le ciel.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many white clouds in the sky.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ zài xiāoshòu bùmén gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je travaille au département des ventes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I work in the sales department.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ dàngāo fēn chéng bā fèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez diviser le gâteau en huit parts.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please divide the cake into eight pieces.
